analysis.description:
PlayerBook.registerNameCore (/unique_chucks/45/0x6384fe27b7b6cc999aa750689c6b04acaeab78d7.sol#229-259) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- foundation.deposit.value(address(this).balance)() (/unique_chucks/45/0x6384fe27b7b6cc999aa750689c6b04acaeab78d7.sol#248)
NameFilter.nameFilter (/unique_chucks/45/0x6384fe27b7b6cc999aa750689c6b04acaeab78d7.sol#369-409) is declared view but contains assembly code
_affID in PlayerBook.registerNameXaddrFromDapp (/unique_chucks/45/0x6384fe27b7b6cc999aa750689c6b04acaeab78d7.sol#321) is a local variable never initialiazed
_affID in PlayerBook.registerNameXaddr (/unique_chucks/45/0x6384fe27b7b6cc999aa750689c6b04acaeab78d7.sol#150) is a local variable never initialiazed
_affID in PlayerBook.registerNameXnameFromDapp (/unique_chucks/45/0x6384fe27b7b6cc999aa750689c6b04acaeab78d7.sol#341-344) is a local variable never initialiazed
_affID in PlayerBook.registerNameXname (/unique_chucks/45/0x6384fe27b7b6cc999aa750689c6b04acaeab78d7.sol#172) is a local variable never initialiazed

PlayerBook.registerNameCore (/unique_chucks/45/0x6384fe27b7b6cc999aa750689c6b04acaeab78d7.sol#229-259) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-foundation.deposit.value(address(this).balance)() (/unique_chucks/45/0x6384fe27b7b6cc999aa750689c6b04acaeab78d7.sol#248)

PlayerBook.addMeToGame has external calls inside a loop:
	- games_[_gameID].receivePlayerNameList(_pID,plyrNameList_[_pID][ii]) (/unique_chucks/45/0x6384fe27b7b6cc999aa750689c6b04acaeab78d7.sol#200-201)

PlayerBook.addMeToAllGames has external calls inside a loop:
	- games_[i].receivePlayerInfo(_pID,_addr,_name,_laff) (/unique_chucks/45/0x6384fe27b7b6cc999aa750689c6b04acaeab78d7.sol#211-213)

PlayerBook.addMeToAllGames has external calls inside a loop:
	- games_[i].receivePlayerNameList(_pID,plyrNameList_[_pID][ii]) (/unique_chucks/45/0x6384fe27b7b6cc999aa750689c6b04acaeab78d7.sol#219-220)

PlayerBook.registerNameCore has external calls inside a loop:
	- games_[i].receivePlayerInfo(_pID,_addr,_name,_affID) (/unique_chucks/45/0x6384fe27b7b6cc999aa750689c6b04acaeab78d7.sol#251-252)

NameFilter.nameFilter uses assembly (/unique_chucks/45/0x6384fe27b7b6cc999aa750689c6b04acaeab78d7.sol#369-409)
	- /unique_chucks/45/0x6384fe27b7b6cc999aa750689c6b04acaeab78d7.sol
